snippet: STORCH--George D. Dec 26, 1921-May 23, 2012 Survivor of the Holocaust. Decorated and twice wounded Lieutenant, 1st Polish Army under Marshal Konstantin Rokossovsky during World War II. In our thoughts and hearts every day for the past 4 years. Your guidance, humor and love is missed by your adoring family. Oliver Storch & Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: STORCH--George D. Dec 26, 1921-May 23, 2012 Survivor of the Holocaust. Decorated and twice wounded Lieutenant, 1st Polish Army under Marshal Konstantin Rokossovsky during World War II. In our thoughts and hearts every day for the past 4 years. Your guidance, humor and love is missed by your adoring family. Oliver Storch & Family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  STORCH, GEORGE D
